slide1Description: Easy court reservations for players and club admins
slide2Description: Manage profiles, memberships and club communications
slide3Description: Join club events, view and manage schedules in one place
slide4Description: Track performance stats and make data-driven improvements

getStarted.title: Let’s Get Started!
getStarted.description:
Enter your email to get started. If you don't have
 an account yet, you will be prompted to create one.
getStarted.continueAgree: By continuing, you agree to CourtReserve’s

form.emailNotFoundDescription: No member associated with the provided email address.

createAccount.title: Set Up Your Account
createAccount.description: Your password must be between 6-40 characters in length.

form.passwordMinLength: Password needs to be 6 characters at min.

review.confirmMessage: Review the information provided and confirm before creating your account.
review.paymentProfileBillingDescription: This organization requires that you save a payment profile to your account

requestCode.title: Let's Find Your Account
requestCode.description: Enter your email to get started. If you don't have an account yet, you will be prompted to create one.

verificationCode.title: Check Your Email
verificationCode.description: We've sent a 6-digit code to {{email}}. The code expires in 15 minutes. Please enter it below.

updatePassword.title: Create New Password
updatePassword.description: New password must be between 6-40 characters in length.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter the email address associated with your account below to receive a reset password link.

authorize.title: Log In to Access Your Account
